attributes.action: More places for the elderly to go to
attributes.additional_details:
The issue of the elderly suffering form lonliness.
We are not talking about carehomes but day clubs for them to attend. They socialise here and can meet new people. Some elderly people have been known to suffer from lonliness in their old age especially if a loved one or close friend has recently passed away.

We call upon the government to give more money to support this issue.
